name: The Time Mansion
description:
Time Mansion is a short horror made in a day by a VFX Artist on UE4!
This mansion claims that it takes something from every person who enters it..will you unveil the secret?

This is a very short and simplistic experience, mainly to give myself some motivation to go back into gamedev after a long break! I really love horror so I'm looking forward to making more! :D

Used some marketplace assets for the visuals!
